text:
@jmil400 I know that I have been exposed to people who have tested positive to Covid-19, my own test was negative.

text:
Crazy.

Got a call that a person at my job had a positive COVID-19 test result. 

I've been home & was advised to self quarantine. Feel fine but it's just crazy.

text:
There's a Doc at my wife's hospital. He has been exposed *thrice* in a week to patients who shortly after were found positive for Covid-19. They refuse to test him, refuse to let him quarantine, and they provide him with zero PPE while he sees patients.

So yeah, it'll get worse.

As of 9am 22 April, 559,935 tests have concluded, with 22,814 tests carried out on 21 April.
